summary: Accomplished Loan Officer who consistently exceeds sales goals while offering the utmost care in client relations. Excited and motivated to help customers build successful financial futures.

experience.title: V/P Commercial Relationship Manager
experience.description: Acquires and retains a portfolio of commercial banking clients; conducts relationship review meetings; identifies opportunities for commercial loan and deposit products, traditional banking, capital management and brokerage services; develops customized client strategies to attain loan, deposit, revenue and new households; ensures superior client service, operational integrity and compliance; manages loan documentation and applicable terms; reviews asset quality; approves credit within authority; negotiates spreads; maintains knowledge of small business and commercial credit policies; contributed to growth from a small portfolio to a middle-market client base; closed multi-million dollar loans for large clients.

experience.title: Supervisor
experience.description: Advises military and DoD civilians on entitlements for shipment of personal property and passenger travel; coordinates transport capability; prepares and labels cargo; inventories shipments; prepares movement documents; plans cradle-to-grave logistics support; integrates supply, maintenance, procurement and QA into logistics activities; proficient in TC-AIMS, Blue Force Tracker, MTS and 88N training; maintains security clearance.

experience.title: Branch Manager / Business Banking Officer
experience.description: Met and exceeded sales goals through outside and related activities; built, developed and managed new and expanded client relationships with small business customers; advised clients on financial needs and goals; identified products/services to meet needs; conducted financial reviews and budget planning; managed branch operations, HR, compliance and facility management; supervised up to 13 staff and 10 business partners; responsible for branch balance sheet and P&L; targeted area included companies with 2â€“10 million in revenue; typical loan sizes frequently exceeded 1 million.

experience.title: Consultant/General Manager
experience.description: Hired to open a Wellness and Fitness Center for the Chase Park Plaza; developed management strategies; created processes for a new fitness center; trained employees; served as temporary general manager until replacement; organized logistics for ordering and shipping of supplies.

experience.title: General Manager
experience.description: Managed multiple 35,000 square foot fitness centers with over 35 employees; oversaw payroll, scheduling, and department training; set budgets for sales teams; maintained reports and P&L; developed managerial talent; ensured branch operations and customer service excellence.

education.degree: Master's in Business/ Management and Leadership
